items.sentence: Nobody wants to be the first one to jump into the pool.
I would\'ve bought more clothes if I had had the money.
Tom said that it probably wouldn\'t take too much time.
Some of Tom\'s classmates can speak French fairly well.
Tom certainly has a different way of looking at things.
Tom leaned over and whispered something in Mary\'s ear.
You should tell Tom that Mary isn\'t likely to do that.
You shouldn\'t tell him anything about your girlfriend.
You\'re not the only one who has had problems with Tom.
I\'m the one who convinced Tom to learn how to do that.
